Dear All,

while writing an connector for Heritrix --> SOLR I got confused
=
by "Content-Type" of "ArchiveRecordHeader" between ARC and WARC format.

Wi=
th ARC format the Content-Type of ArchiveRecordHeader describes the 
conten=
t of the record, the "payload".

With WARC format the Content-Type of Archi=
veRecordHeader describes its 
own header. Luckily extended by "msgtype". Ne=
vertheless the 
ArchiveRecordHeader says nothing about its "payload" and if=
 only feeding
say "text/html" I have to also analyze the content of the rec=
ord.

1) why this change?

2) why not naming the "Content-Type" of the head=
er "WARC-Content-Type"
   and also for "WARC-Content-Length"?

3) while hav=
ing a "WARC-Payload-Digest", why not having a "WARC-Payload-Content-Type"?
=

Best regards
Bernd
